ygData.subject: RE: First trip to Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: have guardian and elemental rhythms memmed, and if fighting tough casters (e.g. festering hags) you can weave those two with a drum and boost your parties
ygData.messageBody:
have guardian and elemental rhythms memmed, and if fighting tough casters
(e.g. festering hags) you can weave those two with a drum and boost your
parties magic resist bigtime. also you can't go wrong with charm as long as
your party knows what you are charming, and have charm down pretty well (i
never really used it and was never that good hehe). plus your normal
anthem, bellow, heal in melee fights. plus lullaby for trains (trademark in
unrest).

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 15 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server



> From: "Edward Scanni" <edwardscanni@...>
>
> Hello all- believe it or not, at level 28 I have yet to
> travel to quite a
> few dungeons. Since I am currently in Kaladim, I thought I
> would give Unrest
> a try.
> My questions are this: what songs should i be using
> primarily-both as a
> battle bard and as a buff party bard?
> My current machime though is only a p233 and weaving more
> than 2 songs,
> maybe 3 on a good connection day, is about my max-2 being the
> norm for me.
> Any suggestions and tips would be greatly appreciated.
>
> Scanna Swiftsinger
> 28th Chorus
> Bertox Server
